timeline.message: Do not repeat LINE and HELP lines in Prometheus format as this is a violation that can be flagged by tools with validation enabled. This can happen for metrics with same name and different tags. We now keep track of TYPE and HELP lines added to format to avoid repetition.
Removed old method as default. Created new unit test.

timeline.bodyText: The List metrics is used only in the immediately next for loop. Maybe instead of collecting into the list use .forEach after the .sorted?
timeline.author: tjquinno

timeline.bodyText:
How about combining these into assertTrue(found.add(metric))?
Because performance is so important inside the test!
timeline.author: tjquinno
tjquinno

timeline.message: Use forEach to avoid creating another list after sorting.
